name: Never Alone (itch) (Ntvou)
description:
Game Brief

You control 2 characters that are trying to escape a place full of obstacles While you need to be aware of the evil spirits that are trying to get you, you can prevent that by keeping the characters in touch with one another, to keep their sanity protected. In the gameplay you need to strategically manage each character within a certain time limit to get from point a to point b.
